snippet: A yearly analysis by the Straphangers Campaign again rated the line as the worst in New York City; the Q took top honors for the first time since 2001.
abstract: Straphangers Campaign's yearly analysis of subway lines in New York City rates the C train as the worst in the system; the Q takes top honors as best.
lead_paragraph: A yearly analysis by the Straphangers Campaign again rated the line as the worst in New York City; the Q took top honors for the first time since 2001.

headline.seo: C Line Again Rated Worst Subway in New York
headline.main: Derided as Dirty and Ugly by Subway Travelers, C Trains Earn Yet Another ‘F’
headline.print_headline: Derided as Dirty and Ugly by Subway Travelers, C Trains Earn Yet Another ‘F’
